image: Amelia opening the mysterious package containing the ancient compass in her study, maps and artifacts scattered around her.
Amelia deciphering a cryptic message on the compass under a starlit sky on the deck of a ship, waves crashing in the background.
Amelia standing in front of the museum exhibit showcasing Blackbeard's treasure, a crowd of visitors marveling at the artifacts as she gazes at the glowing compass with a smile.
